ai-patthana17.7:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.7:1.1_0: Gladness should be given up by seeing. Not seeing the teaching you should give up a cause or reason.
ai-patthana17.7:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.7:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.7:2.1_0: Unskillfulness should be given up by development, nor by development, be given up by developing the bases of the skillful.
ai-patthana17.7:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.7:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.7:3.1_0: Not knowing and not seeing in again, they should give up any cause or reason.
ai-patthana17.7:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
